Posts.Content: soulfulms wrote: hi, i'm a new member and look forward to learning all i can in a short period!! i have mammos every year...i'm post menapausal had a mammo a few weeks ago...the radiologist made the tech smooth out the tissue to get a better view...then he said things were ok...no problem...BUT have a US within the next 3 months...so i had one today...radiologist found 2 nodules...one looks like a "cyst"Â  the other, near left nipple looks like "something"...not sure...reccom'd a core biopsy...i just moved to NY and had a breast surgeon at BarnesJewish Hospital (Washington University St. Louis) when i lived there...i am inclined to have the films sent to my former breast surgeon to see if i really need a biopsy?? any thoughts or questions...BTW...has anyone heard of Ashikari Breast Center in Dobbs Ferry NY...Westchester County? thanks for any input and nice to be here with you all ! Posts.Title: NEW MEMBER soulfulms Megadotz
